metadata.title: CVE-2020-25713 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A malformed input file can lead to a segfault due to an out of bounds arrayaccess in raptor_xml_writer_start_element_common.

criterions.comment: raptor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
raptor2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
